Whether you’re coming from near or far, we’ve got you covered. 


Bike, carpool, or transit – we can help you find the best way to get to, from, and around campus.

Stanford Transportation News

Marguerite Shopping Express Returns for One-Year Pilot

















 



Learn About Stanford's Virtual Parking System

Virtual permits are instantly available, without needing a physical credential. Purchase permits by the day, month, or year, through our online portal.





 



Find Your Way

We have maps to get you to, from and around campus, including service and delivery, carpool parking, and walking-times maps.





 



Get Started at Stanford

Are you a new student or new employee wondering what you need to know about ways to get around Stanford and the Bay Area? We can help you figure it out.







 






Because there’s more to life than being stuck in traffic.


Discover the benefits to commuting a little more sustainably. 





61
%


In 2021, 61% of university commuters used alternative transportation as their primary commute mode.
Learn more
